description: Britney is just getting her feet wet with BDSM. She's reluctant to do much more than poke her toe in, so today we make the day an exploration into this world and see if she can handle it. She is apprehensive about what she is willing to do, so we take it a pace that she can handle. Britney gets close to tapping out a few times, but holds on with everything that she has and gets through the shoot.
title: Bit Tits in Big Trouble
